mapper.select:
select count(*) cnt from ( select a.stock_cd ,a.open_dt ,a.stock_nm ,a.cls_amt ,a.stock_cnt ,a.construction ,a.stock_state ,a.crt_dtm ,a.updt_dtm from tb_kiw_stock_mst a inner join tb_kiw_market b on b.stock_cd = a.stock_cd where 1=1
AND b.market_cd = #{MARKET_CD}
AND a.stock_cd like '%' || #{STOCK_CD} || '%'
AND a.stock_nm like '%' || #{STOCK_NM} || '%'
group by a.stock_cd ,a.open_dt ,a.stock_nm ,a.cls_amt ,a.stock_cnt ,a.construction ,a.stock_state ,a.crt_dtm ,a.updt_dtm ) a
